docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, July 17-- G. Lincoln Sandelin, controller of operations of the Inter-American Development Bank here, died Saturday of a heart attack while on a mission for the bank in Quito, Ecuador. He was 60 years old.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, July 17-- G. Lincoln Sandelin, controller of operations of the Inter-American Development Bank here, died Saturday of a heart attack while on a mission for the bank in Quito, Ecuador. He was 60 years old.

headline.main: G. LINCOLN SANDELIN, LATIN BANK OFFICIAL

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, July 18 (UPI)--The Government imposed today strict restrictions on imports and moved to tighten controls on foreignexchange transactions.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, July 18 (UPI)--The Government imposed today strict restrictions on imports and moved to tighten controls on foreignexchange transactions.
docs.abstract: Govt tightens curbs on foreign-exch transactions

headline.main: Uruguay Imposes Curbs On Nonessential Imports

docs.snippet: BOGOTA, Columbia, July 20 President Carlos Lieras Restrepo, in a state of the nation report issued today, contrasted what he called the "studied vagueness' of the United States attitude toward the projected Latin-American common market with the...
docs.lead_paragraph: BOGOTA, Columbia, July 20 President Carlos Lieras Restrepo, in a state of the nation report issued today, contrasted what he called the "studied vagueness' of the United States attitude toward the projected Latin-American common market with the United States role in the establishment of the European Common Market.
docs.abstract: Colombian Pres Lleras Restrepo chides US for 'studied vagueness' toward Latin-Amer common mkt

headline.main: U.S. CHIDED AS VAGUE ON LATIN TRADE BLOC

docs.snippet: Natl Workers Conv stages 24-hr gen strike to protest inflation and support wage claims of civil servants and pub utility workers
docs.abstract: Natl Workers Conv stages 24-hr gen strike to protest inflation and support wage claims of civil servants and pub utility workers

docs.snippet: 5,000 evacuated, central and southern Uruguay, after wk of floods and rains
docs.abstract: 5,000 evacuated, central and southern Uruguay, after wk of floods and rains

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, July 22--Mr. and Mrs. Robert Forbes Woodward have announced the engagement of their daughter, Miss Mary Cooke Woodward, to Cornelius Lansing Fair, son of Dr. and Mrs. Gordon Maskew Fair of Cambridge, Mass.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, July 22--Mr. and Mrs. Robert Forbes Woodward have announced the engagement of their daughter, Miss Mary Cooke Woodward, to Cornelius Lansing Fair, son of Dr. and Mrs. Gordon Maskew Fair of Cambridge, Mass.

headline.main: Mary Woodward Engaged to Wed Cornelius L. Fair
